content: Stream created by Nathanael Arkor.
Nathanael Arkor changed the access permissions for this stream from Public to Web-public.

Matteo Capucci (he/him) changed the description for this stream.

  • Old description:

Discussion the translation of mathematical texts

  • New description:

Deprecated, use #practice: communication instead. Discussion the translation of mathematical texts
Matteo Capucci (he/him) renamed stream practice: translation to deprecated: translation.

Matteo Capucci (he/him) changed the posting permissions for this stream:

  • Old permissions: All stream members can post.
  • New permissions: Only organization administrators and moderators can post.
